sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content:
### 1.1 Personal Information
We do **not** collect personally identifiable information such as your name, email, or phone number.

### 1.2 Device and Usage Data
We collect anonymous data including:

* Device information (e.g., model, OS, language)
* Gameplay data (e.g., session time, score, frequency)
* Crash logs and error diagnostics

### 1.3 Advertising and Analytics
We collect:

* Anonymous advertising identifiers (e.g., Google Advertising ID)
* Data related to ad views and engagement

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
We use collected data to:

* Provide core game functionality and save local progress
* Improve gameplay experience and app stability
* Serve rewarded video and in-app advertisements
* Monitor app usage and optimize design
* Comply with applicable laws and regulations

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.content:
Our app uses trusted third-party services which may collect data under their own policies:

* **Google Firebase** (Authentication, Analytics, Crashlytics, Firestore)
* **Google AdMob** (Advertising and rewards)
* **Google Play Games / Apple Game Center** (Leaderboards, achievements â€“ optional)

Refer to each provider's privacy policy for full details.

sections.title: Data Storage and Security
sections.content:
* Game progress is saved locally on your device.
* Analytical and crash data is securely transmitted and stored via encrypted connections (HTTPS).
* We take reasonable steps to ensure the safety of your data.

sections.title: Your Choices
sections.content:
You can:

* Disable personalized ads in your device settings
* Reset your advertising ID
* Request deletion of your anonymized usage data by contacting us

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: This app is intended for users aged **15 and older**. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13. If such data is discovered, we will delete it promptly upon request.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify users of significant changes within the app.
